DOC.criteria: Admission medical ICU ( MICU ) Highrisk Venous Thromboembolism ( VTE ) ≥ 1 following : Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 30 kg/m2 Personal family history VTE Receiving vasopressor Indication therapeutic anticoagulation Evidence deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) ultrasonography admission Indwelling intrathecal , epidural , indwell deep catheter Recent ( < 3 month ) International Society Thrombosis Haemostasis ( ISTH ) major bleeding13 Recent ( < 3 month ) major trauma Recent ( < 3 month ) neurosurgery orthopedic surgery Pregnancy Contraindication heparin heparin product
